name: Pixel Killers - The Showdown
description:
Pixel Killers - The Showdown is a shared screen local multiplayer game.

Features:
-2 to 4 players
-Top down
-Local multiplayer, shared screen
-Two game modes - Deathmatch and Deal gone bad, hold the cash
-All vs All, 2 vs 2, 2 vs 1 + sentry
-Move in ANY of 8 directions while shooting in ANY of 8 directions!
-Multiple pixels handled on-screen at the same time!
-5 maps (more might come)
-Has music and sound effects

This is a video game, made by some developer.
